settings.content: Elevate Your Home Gym - Customizable, Compact, Flexible, Engineered for Peak Performance.

settings.f_content:
• With 7 different weight options (5 lbs to 44 lbs).
  • Sturdy aluminium handles and double-layered ABS plastic material ensure a comfortable grip and durability.
  • Compact and portable, easy to store and carry to meet space-saving needs.
  • Built-in safety locking mechanism to ensure safety during workouts.

In-stock orders are processed within 24 hours, with delivery typically taking 3-7 business days. Please note, we do not accept returns but offer replacements for defective products.

Click here to view more details.

Liberty insurance coverage

We are partnered up with Liberty Insurance to cover injuries due to product faults or misfunctions during your training up to 4 million dollars (Coverage is limited to dumbbell products purchased from Ativafit website)
Before adjusting the weight of the kettlebell, make sure the two arrows on the warning sign line up with the arrows on the base.

settings.title: Buy one get more, 7 kettlebells in 1

settings.slidetext: Our 7-in-1 adjustable kettlebell (5 to 44 lbs) lets you easily customize workout intensity as your strength and endurance grow.
Our durable adjustable kettlebell features a solid aluminum handle and ergonomic wide grip for secure, comfortable workouts.
Our compact, portable adjustable kettlebell is perfect for home or gym workouts, offering a space-saving solution for your active lifestyle.
Our kettlebell features a reliable safety lock that keeps weights secure, preventing shifting or rattling, so you can focus on your form and technique.
Our adjustable kettlebell offers full-body workout versatility, targeting multiple muscles with swings, squats, lunges, and presses.

settings.heading: Flex Your Fitness: Anywhere, Anytime
settings.subheading: The Home Gym That Keeps You Moving
settings.scene_text_01: The 66lb dumbbells are heavy enough to challenge even the most experienced lifters. They're perfect for compound exercises like squats, deadlifts, and bench presses, which work multiple muscle groups at once.
settings.scene_text_02: The adjustable weight range allows you to target specific muscle groups with isolation exercises like bicep curls, tricep extensions, and shoulder raises.
settings.scene_text_03: 66lb dumbbells can be used to perform functional exercises like dumbbell swings, clean and presses, and box jumps. These exercises are great for improving your overall fitness and athleticism.
settings.scene_text_04: The 66lb dumbbells can be used to add intensity to your cardio workouts. Try doing dumbbell swings, cleans, or presses for intervals to burn calories and improve your cardiovascular health.
settings.scene_text_05: High-intensity interval training (HIIT) is a great way to burn fat and improve your fitness. The 66lb dumbbells can be used to perform HIIT exercises like dumbbell burpees, snatches, or jerk.

settings.question: What is the weight range of this adjustable kettlebell?
settings.answer: The kettlebell offers a weight range from 5 lbs to 44 lbs, with 7 different adjustable settings (5, 11.5, 18, 24.5, 31, 37.5, 44 lbs).

settings.question: How does the weight adjustment mechanism work?
settings.answer: The kettlebell is equipped with a quick and easy adjustment system. Simply turn the dial to select your desired weight.

settings.question: Is this kettlebell suitable for beginners?
settings.answer: Yes, with the starting weight of 5 lbs, it's ideal for beginners and can be progressively increased as you build strength.

settings.question: What materials are used in this kettlebell?
settings.answer: It features a solid aluminum handle and durable double-layer ABS plastic to withstand intense workouts.

settings.question: Can this kettlebell be used for a full-body workout?
settings.answer: Yes, the adjustable kettlebell is designed for a wide range of exercises, targeting various muscle groups, including swings, squats, lunges, and presses.

settings.question: Is the grip comfortable for long workouts?
settings.answer: The kettlebell has an ergonomic, wide-grip handle, which ensures a secure and comfortable hold, reducing hand fatigue.

settings.question: Is the kettlebell compact and easy to store?
settings.answer: Yes, the kettlebell is compact and portable, making it easy to store and transport for home or gym workouts.

settings.question: Does the kettlebell have a safety locking system?
settings.answer: Yes, it is equipped with a reliable safety locking system to keep the weights securely in place during workouts.

settings.question: What exercises can I do with this adjustable kettlebell?
settings.answer: You can perform a variety of exercises, including kettlebell swings, squats, lunges, presses, and more, targeting both upper and lower body muscles.

settings.heading: Ativafit Personalized Plan Quick Registration
settings.text: Welcome to the first step in your Ativafit personalized journey! By providing some basic information, you're on your way to getting a fitness and nutrition plan tailored just for you. Please fill out this quick registration form, and our team will be in touch to dive deeper into your lifestyle and workout habits, ensuring a detailed and specific plan is crafted to meet your needs.
